settings.text:
Discipleship Road is for those who want to learn with the

purpose of following and practicing the precepts taught by Jesus.Â 

Discipleship Road is meant for those who are looking for a deeper walk with Christ and want to know Him more.

Discipleship Road is also a place where you can find various kinds of resources and training materials that will help and encourage those who seek to follow Christ and/or have been on the journey with Christ.

Tony Salerno has been on the Discipleship Road, ministering to youth and adults for several decades. He has impacted and trained leaders though evangelism, music, and other media resources. Tony is an author, music producer, and speaker.
